body.header: What will I learn in this unit?

section.div:
Problem and solution 1You will ...
analyse a writing task and match paragraph headings to paragraphs.
organize notes into paragraphs.
complete a composition with words and phrases used to express cause and effect and to suggest solutions.
complete sentences expressing cause and effect with appropriate words and phrases.
listen and group comments according to whether they are causes of the problem or possible solutions to the problem.
